# Go-to-Market Planner: PetPulse

**Generated by:** StratArts Go-to-Market Planner
**Date:** December 2025
**Business:** PetPulse - Smart Pet Health Monitoring

---

## Executive Summary

PetPulse's go-to-market strategy leverages a phased launch targeting anxious pet parents through digital channels, vet partnerships, and community marketing. The strategy prioritizes building credibility through early detection testimonials before scaling acquisition through paid channels.

**Launch Timeline:** 6-month phased rollout
**Initial Market:** US (dogs only)
**Target Y1:** 10,000 users, 500 paid subscriptions
**CAC Target:** <$100/user
**Primary Channels:** Facebook/Instagram, Vet partnerships, Influencer marketing

---

## Market Entry Strategy

### Geographic Focus

**Phase 1 (Months 1-6):** United States only
- 90.5M pet dogs in US
- High pet spending ($136.8B industry)
- Established telehealth regulations
- English-language launch simplicity

**Phase 2 (Months 7-12):** Expand to Canada, UK
**Phase 3 (Year 2+):** EU, Australia

### Segment Prioritization

| Segment | Priority | Rationale |
|---------|----------|-----------|
| Anxious pet parents | P0 | Highest pain, fastest conversion |
| Tech-forward owners | P1 | Early adopters, premium willingness |
| Busy professionals | P2 | Higher LTV, harder acquisition |
| Multi-pet households | P3 | Expansion after product-market fit |

### Initial Beachhead

**Target Profile:**
- Female, 28-42 years old
- Income: $75K-150K
- Dog owner (any breed)
- Urban/suburban location
- Active on Instagram/Facebook
- Has experienced pet health scare

**Why this beachhead:**
- Highest anxiety = fastest conversion
- Most vocal advocates = organic growth
- Easiest to reach = lower CAC

---

## Channel Strategy

### Channel Mix (Year 1)

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    CHANNEL MIX - YEAR 1                         │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  PAID DIGITAL                               40% of budget       │
│  ├── Facebook/Instagram Ads                 25%                 │
│  ├── Google Search (problem keywords)       10%                 │
│  └── YouTube Pre-roll                       5%                  │
│                                                                 │
│  PARTNERSHIPS                               25% of budget       │
│  ├── Vet clinic partnerships               15%                 │
│  └── Pet influencer campaigns               10%                 │
│                                                                 │
│  CONTENT/ORGANIC                            20% of budget       │
│  ├── SEO content marketing                  10%                 │
│  ├── Social media organic                   5%                  │
│  └── Email marketing                        5%                  │
│                                                                 │
│  PR/BRAND                                   15% of budget       │
│  ├── Launch PR                              8%                  │
│  ├── Product reviews/coverage               5%                  │
│  └── Industry events                        2%                  │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Channel Deep Dive

#### Facebook/Instagram Ads (Primary)

**Target Audiences:**
1. Dog owners interested in pet health
2. Lookalike of early adopters
3. Retargeting website visitors
4. Pet parents in specific breeds (health-prone)

**Ad Types:**
- Video testimonials (early detection stories)
- Carousel (features + benefits)
- Stories (day-in-the-life)
- Lead gen (email capture)

**Budget:** $50K/month (at scale)
**Target CAC:** $60-80

#### Vet Partnerships (Credibility)

**Partnership Model:**
- In-clinic displays and brochures
- Vet recommendation program (referral fee)
- Co-branded content
- Telehealth network recruitment

**Target:** 500 vet clinics in Year 1
**Expected Volume:** 2,000 referrals
**CAC via Vet:** $40-60 (lower, higher intent)

#### Pet Influencers (Awareness)

**Influencer Tiers:**
- Micro (10K-50K): $200-500/post, 50 influencers
- Mid (50K-250K): $1,000-3,000/post, 10 influencers
- Macro (250K+): $5,000-15,000/post, 2 influencers

**Content Types:**
- Unboxing and setup
- 30-day usage diary
- "PetPulse caught my dog's issue" stories
- Discount codes for tracking

**Budget:** $100K/year
**Expected Reach:** 5M+ impressions

#### SEO/Content Marketing (Long-term)

**Content Pillars:**
1. Pet health education (symptoms, diseases)
2. Pet parent anxiety content (when to worry)
3. Product comparison (vs. cameras, trackers)
4. User stories (early detection)

**Target Keywords:**
- "dog acting weird" (40K/mo)
- "should I take my dog to the vet" (22K/mo)
- "dog health monitoring" (2K/mo)
- "pet telehealth" (5K/mo)

**Content Volume:** 8-12 articles/month
**Traffic Goal:** 100K organic visits/month by Month 12

---

## Launch Plan

### Pre-Launch (Months -3 to 0)

**Month -3:**
- Finalize MVP features
- Recruit beta users (200)
- Set up analytics
- Prepare launch content

**Month -2:**
- Beta testing begins
- Collect testimonials
- Refine app based on feedback
- Build press list

**Month -1:**
- Finalize manufacturing
- Create launch assets (video, images)
- Set up ad accounts
- Schedule influencer posts

### Launch Phase (Month 0-1)

**Launch Week Activities:**

| Day | Activity | Owner |
|-----|----------|-------|
| D-7 | Teaser posts on social | Marketing |
| D-3 | Embargo lifts, reviews published | PR |
| D-1 | Email blast to waitlist | Marketing |
| D-Day | Launch announcement, ads live | All |
| D+1 | Influencer posts go live | Partnerships |
| D+3 | Follow-up press outreach | PR |
| D+7 | First performance review | Marketing |

**Launch Goals:**
- 500 collar sales in Week 1
- 2,000 waitlist signups
- 10 press mentions
- 4.5+ App Store rating

### Post-Launch Growth (Months 2-6)

**Month 2:** Optimize & Iterate
- Analyze CAC by channel
- A/B test ad creative
- Double down on winners
- Cut underperformers

**Month 3:** Scale Winners
- Increase budget on best channels
- Expand vet partnership network
- Launch referral program

**Month 4-6:** Expand & Diversify
- Test new channels (TikTok, podcasts)
- Geographic expansion prep
- Build case study library

---

## Pricing & Offer Strategy

### Launch Pricing

| Product | Price | Notes |
|---------|-------|-------|
| PetPulse Collar | $199 | One-time purchase |
| Monthly Subscription | $29/month | Monitoring + telehealth |
| Annual Subscription | $249/year | 28% discount |
| Bundle (Collar + Annual) | $399 | $49 savings |

### Launch Promotions

**Founders Offer (Launch Week):**
- $50 off collar ($149)
- 3 months free subscription
- Limited to first 500 orders
- Code: FOUNDER

**Influencer Codes:**
- 20% off collar
- 1 month free subscription
- Trackable by influencer

**Vet Referral:**
- $30 off collar
- 1 month free subscription
- $20 referral fee to vet

### Conversion Funnel

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    CONVERSION FUNNEL                            │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  AWARENESS                           100,000 monthly visitors   │
│  (Ads, SEO, PR, Influencers)               │                    │
│                                            ▼                    │
│  INTEREST                            10,000 engaged (10%)       │
│  (Website, Product page)                   │                    │
│                                            ▼                    │
│  CONSIDERATION                       3,000 cart adds (30%)      │
│  (Cart, Pricing page)                      │                    │
│                                            ▼                    │
│  PURCHASE                            1,500 orders (50%)         │
│  (Checkout complete)                       │                    │
│                                            ▼                    │
│  ACTIVATION                          1,200 active (80%)         │
│  (Collar setup + app)                      │                    │
│                                            ▼                    │
│  RETENTION                           900 Month 3 active (75%)   │
│  (Ongoing subscription)                                         │
│                                                                 │
│  CAC: $80   |   LTV: $350   |   LTV:CAC = 4.4:1                │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

---

## Sales Strategy

### Direct-to-Consumer (Primary)

**Website:** petpulse.com
- Shopify or custom e-commerce
- Mobile-optimized
- Subscription management via Stripe

**Conversion Tactics:**
- Exit intent popup (10% off)
- Abandoned cart email sequence
- Live chat support
- 30-day money-back guarantee

### B2B Channel (Secondary)

**Target B2B Customers:**
- Vet clinics (wholesale program)
- Pet boarding facilities
- Dog breeders (health monitoring)
- Pet insurance companies (partnership)

**B2B Model:**
- Wholesale pricing (40% margin)
- Minimum order: 10 units
- Co-marketing support
- White-label option (future)

### Retail (Future - Year 2+)

**Potential Partners:**
- Petco / PetSmart
- Amazon (third-party or vendor)
- Chewy
- Target / Walmart (premium pet aisle)

**Requirements Before Retail:**
- 10,000+ DTC sales proven
- Strong reviews (4.5+ stars)
- Demonstrated demand
- Margin optimization

---

## Marketing Budget

### Year 1 Budget Allocation

| Category | Budget | % of Total |
|----------|--------|------------|
| **Paid Digital** | $240,000 | 40% |
| - Facebook/Instagram | $150,000 | 25% |
| - Google Search | $60,000 | 10% |
| - YouTube | $30,000 | 5% |
| **Partnerships** | $150,000 | 25% |
| - Vet partnerships | $90,000 | 15% |
| - Influencer campaigns | $60,000 | 10% |
| **Content/Organic** | $120,000 | 20% |
| - SEO/Content | $60,000 | 10% |
| - Social media | $30,000 | 5% |
| - Email marketing | $30,000 | 5% |
| **PR/Brand** | $90,000 | 15% |
| - Launch PR | $48,000 | 8% |
| - Reviews/Coverage | $30,000 | 5% |
| - Events | $12,000 | 2% |
| **TOTAL** | **$600,000** | 100% |

### Monthly Budget Phasing

| Month | Budget | Focus |
|-------|--------|-------|
| 1-2 | $30K/mo | Launch PR, influencers |
| 3-4 | $40K/mo | Scale paid, test channels |
| 5-6 | $50K/mo | Double down on winners |
| 7-9 | $60K/mo | Scale and optimize |
| 10-12 | $70K/mo | Aggressive growth |

---

## Messaging Framework

### Core Messages by Funnel Stage

**Awareness (Problem-Aware):**
"Worried about your pet's health? You're not alone."

**Interest (Solution-Aware):**
"PetPulse monitors your pet's vital signs 24/7—so you always know they're okay."

**Consideration (Product-Aware):**
"See how Max's health scare was caught early with PetPulse."

**Decision (Ready to Buy):**
"Join 10,000 pet parents who sleep better knowing their pets are monitored."

### Channel-Specific Messaging

| Channel | Primary Message | CTA |
|---------|-----------------|-----|
| Facebook | Emotional (peace of mind) | "Learn More" |
| Instagram | Visual (collar + app) | "Shop Now" |
| Google | Problem/solution | "Get PetPulse" |
| Vet clinic | Clinical credibility | "Ask Your Vet" |
| Influencer | Personal story | "Use Code X" |
| Email | Value + urgency | "Order Today" |

---

## Partnerships Strategy

### Vet Clinic Partnerships

**Partnership Model:**
```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                VET CLINIC PARTNERSHIP MODEL                     │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  PETPULSE PROVIDES:                                             │
│  ├── In-clinic display materials                                │
│  ├── Patient education brochures                                │
│  ├── Vet training on product                                    │
│  ├── $20 referral fee per sale                                  │
│  └── Co-branded content                                         │
│                                                                 │
│  VET CLINIC PROVIDES:                                           │
│  ├── Product recommendation to patients                         │
│  ├── Display space in waiting room                              │
│  ├── Staff endorsement                                          │
│  └── Patient data insights (anonymized)                         │
│                                                                 │
│  TRACKING:                                                      │
│  └── Unique referral code per clinic                            │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

**Target:** 500 partner clinics by Month 12
**Strategy:** Start with independent clinics, then approach chains (VCA, Banfield)

### Pet Insurance Partnerships

**Value Proposition:**
- Monitored pets = better data = better risk assessment
- Early detection = lower claims
- Premium discount incentive for PetPulse users

**Target Partners:**
- Healthy Paws
- Embrace
- Nationwide Pet Insurance
- Lemonade (pet)

**Model:** Co-marketing + data sharing (with user consent)

### Influencer Partnerships

**Ideal Influencer Profile:**
- Authentic pet content creator
- 20K-200K followers (sweet spot)
- High engagement rate (>3%)
- Has discussed pet health before
- Audience matches target demo

**Partnership Tiers:**

| Tier | Followers | Payment | Deliverables |
|------|-----------|---------|--------------|
| Ambassador | 10K-50K | Product + $200 | 2 posts, ongoing stories |
| Partner | 50K-200K | Product + $1,500 | 3 posts, 1 video |
| Featured | 200K+ | Product + $5,000 | Campaign, interview |

---

## Launch Metrics & KPIs

### Pre-Launch Metrics

| Metric | Target | Tracking |
|--------|--------|----------|
| Waitlist signups | 5,000 | Email capture |
| Beta users | 200 | Beta program |
| Press mentions | 20 | Media monitoring |
| Influencer confirmed | 30 | Partnership tracker |

### Launch Week Metrics

| Metric | Target | Tracking |
|--------|--------|----------|
| Website visits | 50,000 | Google Analytics |
| Collar sales | 500 | E-commerce |
| Conversion rate | 2% | E-commerce |
| App downloads | 600 | App Store |
| Press mentions | 10 | Media monitoring |
| Social mentions | 1,000 | Social listening |

### Month 1-3 Metrics

| Metric | Target | Tracking |
|--------|--------|----------|
| Monthly active users | 2,000 | Product analytics |
| Subscription rate | 70% | Billing system |
| Monthly churn | <5% | Billing system |
| NPS score | 50+ | Survey |
| CAC | <$100 | Marketing analytics |
| Review rating | 4.5+ | App Store |

### Year 1 Targets

| Metric | Target |
|--------|--------|
| Total collar sales | 10,000 |
| Active subscriptions | 7,000 |
| Annual recurring revenue | $2M+ |
| CAC | $80 |
| LTV | $350 |
| LTV:CAC | 4.4:1 |
| NPS | 60+ |

---

## Risk Mitigation

### Launch Risks

| Risk | Likelihood | Impact | Mitigation |
|------|------------|--------|------------|
| Supply chain delays | Medium | High | Order inventory 3 months early |
| Negative reviews | Medium | High | Exceptional onboarding, support |
| Low conversion | Medium | Medium | A/B test landing pages |
| High CAC | Medium | Medium | Diversify channels, optimize |
| Technical issues | Low | High | Extensive beta testing |
| Competitive launch | Low | Medium | Speed to market, differentiation |

### Contingency Plans

**If CAC > $150:**
- Shift to organic channels
- Increase vet partnerships
- Aggressive referral program
- Reduce paid spend

**If Conversion < 1%:**
- User research (why not buying)
- Landing page optimization
- Pricing/offer testing
- Feature messaging adjustment

**If Churn > 10%/month:**
- Onboarding improvements
- Feature usage analysis
- Customer success outreach
- Pricing restructure

---

## 90-Day Launch Checklist

### Month -1 (Pre-Launch)

- [ ] Manufacturing complete, inventory staged
- [ ] Website live, checkout tested
- [ ] Ad accounts set up and funded
- [ ] Influencer content scheduled
- [ ] Press kit distributed
- [ ] Email sequences ready
- [ ] Support team trained
- [ ] Analytics configured

### Month 0 (Launch)

- [ ] Launch announcement published
- [ ] Ads activated
- [ ] Press outreach begins
- [ ] Influencer posts go live
- [ ] Email to waitlist sent
- [ ] Social media launch content
- [ ] Monitor all channels
- [ ] Daily performance tracking

### Month 1 (Optimize)

- [ ] Week 1 performance review
- [ ] A/B tests running
- [ ] Customer feedback collected
- [ ] CAC by channel calculated
- [ ] First cohort analysis
- [ ] Paid channel optimization
- [ ] Influencer performance review
- [ ] Month 1 report completed

### Month 2-3 (Scale)

- [ ] Scale winning channels
- [ ] Cut underperformers
- [ ] Referral program launched
- [ ] Vet partnership expansion
- [ ] Content library growing
- [ ] SEO traffic increasing
- [ ] Brand awareness building
- [ ] Prepare for V1.1 launch

---

## Summary

### Go-to-Market Strategy

| Element | Strategy |
|---------|----------|
| Target | Anxious pet parents, US dogs |
| Channel | Facebook/Instagram + Vet + Influencer |
| Offer | $199 collar + $29/mo subscription |
| Launch | Founders pricing, limited inventory |
| Scale | Optimize CAC, expand partnerships |

### Key Success Factors

1. **Emotional storytelling** - Lead with early detection stories
2. **Vet credibility** - Clinical endorsement builds trust
3. **Community building** - Turn customers into advocates
4. **Fast iteration** - Optimize based on data weekly
5. **Support excellence** - 4.5+ star reviews critical

### Year 1 Goals

- 10,000 collar sales
- 7,000 active subscriptions
- $2M+ ARR
- LTV:CAC > 4:1
- NPS > 60
